item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hi there, I recently turned 21, and decided to start a blog. I will be updating it, sharing insights into my current work and experiences. I hope to learn to better communicate my thoughts and ideas and effectively convey them to an audience. Thanks for stopping by!

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hi, again. This is my personal website. If you wish to contact me, you can find me here.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can find me on the following platforms: Email Github Gitlab Linkedin Feel free to reach out to me!
